newsitem.title: USA: Spatial Technology sets IPO price range.
newsitem.headline: Spatial Technology sets IPO price range.

text.p: Spatial Technology Inc has proposed an estimated pricing range of $9 to $11 a share for its upcoming initial public offering, a spokesman from underwriter Dain Bosworth Inc said on Friday.

The company previously did not propose a pricing range. The value of the range puts the IPO's value at about $21 million. Spatial plans to offer 2.1 million shares in the deal, which is tentively scheduled for late September or early October, the spokesman said.
The Boulder, Colo., company develops software that allows users to create and modify three-dimensional (3D) shapes on a computer.
